# Cloak of Arachnida
## Overview
**Aura** moderate conjuration and transmutation; **CL** 6th

**Slot** shoulders

**Price** 14,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This black garment, embroidered with a web-like pattern in silk, gives the wearer the ability to climb as if a *[[Spider Climb (Spell)|spider climb]]* spell had been placed upon her. In addition, the cloak grants her immunity to entrapment by *[[Web (Spell)|web]]* spells or webs of any sort; she can actually move in webs at half her normal speed. Once per day, the wearer of this cloak can cast *[[Web (Spell)|web]]*. She also gains a +2 luck bonus on all Fortitude saves against poison from spiders.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Spider Climb (Spell)|spider climb]], [[Web (Spell)|web]]*

**Cost** 7,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 506
